quote: Don't wish for it - Work for it
You're only one workout away from a good mood
When you think about quitting, think about why you started
I'm not here to be average. I'm here to be awesome
Good things come to those who sweat
If it doesn't challenge you, it doesn't change you
Don't give up. One day you'll look back and be glad you didn't
Focus on health, not on weight
There's no reason why you can't have those flat abs
Nothing feels better than a finished workout
Work hard & be proud of what you achieve
Motivation is what gets you started - Habit is what keeps you going
